text: Of the unethical and lawless behavior of the senior FBI and DOJ officials responsible for Hillary-Emails and Trump-Russia investigations, sure
author: bhweingarten

text: The power to prosecute is the power to destroy — and given absolute power corrupts absolutely, all the more reason prosecutors who abuse their powers and engage in misconduct must face consequences. So many people have nowhere to go to get their reputations, wealth and lives back
author: bhweingarten

text: Reminder that on a bipartisan basis, Congressmen wanted to violate presidential power and protect a special counsel who was subordinate to the chief executive, all because Trump. But norms, and institutions and rule of law
author: bhweingarten

text: Sen Leahy doth protest too much. Odds of Mueller report release plus POTUS declassifying EVERYTHING related to Russiagate are infinitely higher than, say, DOJ releasing the docs it’s stonewalled on for months, not to mention DAG Rosenstein even testifying
author: bhweingarten

text: It is an utterly amazing thing to see the president’s worst enemies having spent over two years tearing through every aspect of his life to try to find something, anything, even a salacious and unverified dossier collected from sketchy Russian sources to destroy him — and nothing
author: bhweingarten

text: Reminder that Gen Flynn’s life was ruined over perfectly lawful conversations with a foreign counterpart, and the threat of using FARA laws against him that have virtually never been applied, solely as a result of the Mueller special counsel having been ordered
author: bhweingarten

text: Who in our gov will advocate for investigating the investigators? Absent justice for those who committed unethical and/or lawless acts in service of these “investigations,” there will be nothing to stop future concocted fishing expeditions aimed at criminalizing pol difference
author: bhweingarten

text: Happy anniversary!
author: bhweingarten

text: Catherine Herridge’s report that not subjects but mere witnesses had to deal with hundred thousand dollar legal bills over a Mueller special counsel investigation that should’ve never even been ordered is Exhibit A for the need to rein in prosecutorial power
author: bhweingarten

text: Reminder that before Russian collusion, the Left was spinning up the narrative about hacks/leaks throwing the election to Trump. Disingenuous hysteria from start to finish because the Democrats lost an election and couldn’t accept it/had to delegitimize it
author: bhweingarten

text: “As Americans, we should always expect that agents of foreign powers are going to do things to try and undermine and disrupt our way of life. But it is incalculably worse when Americans knowingly do it against ourselves, and all merely for political gain.”
author: bhweingarten

text: As noted 13 months ago: “The Left has achieved the ends...Russians supposedly sought, of sowing discord & undermining our core pol insts...Russia hysteria peddlers are engaging in a more effective disinfo campaign than Russians could have ever constructed” http://thefederalist.com/2018/02/21/russia-collusion-mongers-hurt-america-far-worse-indicted-russians/ …
author: bhweingarten

text: The process is and has always been the true punishment for President Trump — all while protecting the perpetrators of the unethical and illegal acts intended to bring him down. This has been about chilling and even criminalizing dissent against the establishment #MuellerReport
